captions.text: Would you excuse me?
(CLEARS THROAT)

All right,
what do you have?

''Representative Charles Wilson
has learned he is joining
several members of Congress

Don't say task force.
It makes it sound

like Eliot Ness
is running the thing.
Okay.

Who is running the thing?
Who's the prosecutor?

Rudolph Giuliani,
New York, Southern District.

You know him?
No.

Well, it's been going
on forever. We should
say that, too.

''Representative Charles Wilson
has learned he is joining
several members of Congress

''who are under investigation
by the Justice Department

''in what is now
an 18-month long,
wide-ranging examination

''that has resulted
in no convictions.''

''Congressman Wilson
has not been charged
with any crime,

''nor has he been questioned
by the authorities.

''He denies any allegation
of illegal or improper
behavior
Okay. Run it by Stu.
JAILBAIT: Yes, sir.
Gus!

You and three other guys?
Yeah.

Well, l'll tell you
what l told Harold Holt.
l can get the money.

Now, the 10 million is a ioke?
Fine. What do you need?

To do what?
To shoot down
the helicopters.

To shoot down
the helicopters.

lf we can help them shoot down
the goddamn helicopters,

everything's gonna
start going our way.

You know, there's
a story about a Zen master
and a little boy.

(KNOCK ON DOOR)
All right, and... Yeah.
lt's Stu.
You should be on this.
Stu?

No. No,
it's gonna be fine.
lt was a party in Vegas.

Lot of drugs,
Iot of people
l don't know.

l was there with Crystal Lee
and this guy Paul Brown

who wanted me to invest
in a TV show for Crystal.
l don't know.

l don't know, it's
gonna be like a Dallas
set in Washington.

What... Stu,
what does it matter?
Okay.
Okay.

Will Crystal back up
your story that you
weren't using?

Just go put out
the statement.
You know what?

You never should have been
in the same room, Congressman.
(DOOR SLAMS)
Gus!

Yeah.
The Swiss make
an antiaircraft gun

called the Oerlikon.
Listen, Charlie.

Twenty-millimeter cannon,
high rate of fire.
l know the Oerlikon.

Don't forget
the limo driver.
What do you mean?

Well, you took a limo
from the casino to
the airport.

Maybe it's easy enough
to track down a limo driver,
hand him a subpoena,

ask him if anything
was going on in
the back seat,

so, you know,
in terms of cleaning
up this...

Were you listening
at the door?

l wasn't listening
at the door.
Were you standing

at the goddamn door
listening to me?
No.

How could you even...
That's a thick door!

You stood there
and you listened to me?

l wasn't standing at the door.
Don't be an idiot.
l bugged the Scotch bottle.
What?

Yeah, it's got a little
transmitter on it.

l got a little thing
in my ear. Get past it.

l don't believe this. Who the
fuck... Who the fuck are you?

lt's not in my ear right now.
Take it easy.

l was gonna tell you about it,
but l had to leave the room
for a second

'cause you were getting
indicted.
l ain't getting indicted.

ls there a camera in here?
No, that's a little paranoid.
That's right.

Will you take the bug
off my Scotch bottle now?
Sure.

comments.text:
So is she a slave-girl or is she using people as her puppet? Which one of 
the two? And how do you explain Charlie Wilson having to convince Israeli 
weapon dealers and actually having to * deceive* congress (which means he 
was dependent on their vote)? He seemed dependent on a lot of different 
groups, this movie cannot be seen from the perspective of a few families 
being in control of the wealth, it really is more complicated than that. 
Don't draw conclusions too quickly.
